medical_history.chief_complaint: Dull pain in the right lower quadrant (RLQ) for 2 days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began 2 days ago, originally dull but now improving. It is located several centimeters medial and inferior to McBurney's point. The pain is uncomfortable with movement but there is no pain at rest. The patient reports one episode of diarrhea and has not had a bowel movement since. Symptoms are aggravated by walking and shifting position in bed.
medical_history.family_history: No history of inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) or abdominal cancer.
